revised_title: An In-Depth Analysis of Wheat Yield Periodicity in Eastern England from 1885 to 1905
tldr: This study investigates the periodicity in wheat yield for eastern England between 1885 and 1905, revealing a remarkable correlation with a simple periodic oscillation of 11 years' period. The findings suggest that the yield can be represented by a combination of five harmonic components, providing a valuable insight into the factors affecting agricultural productivity.
